TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit AppDomainUnloadedException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 当尝试访问已卸载的应用程序域时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an attempt is made to access an unloaded application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，即在未处理的用户代码会产生以下影响：In the .NET Framework version 2.0, an that is not handled in user code has the following effect: - 如果线程已启动在托管代码中，将它终止。If a thread was started in managed code, it is terminated. 不允许未经处理的异常终止该应用程序。The unhandled exception is not allowed to terminate the application. - 如果任务在其上执行线程，它已终止，线程返回给该线程池。If a task is executing on a thread, it is terminated and the thread is returned to the thread pool. 不允许未经处理的异常终止该应用程序。The unhandled exception is not allowed to terminate the application. - 如果一个线程启动在非托管代码中，如主应用程序的线程，就会终止。If a thread started in unmanaged code, such as the main application thread, it is terminated. 未经处理的异常允许继续进行，并且操作系统终止应用程序。The unhandled exception is allowed to proceed, and the operating system terminates the application. 使用 HRESULT COR_E_APPDOMAINUNLOADED，其值 0x80131014。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_APPDOMAINUNLOADED, which has the value 0x80131014. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示的效果在各种线程和第二个的显示基本应用程序域卸载。The first example demonstrates the effects of an on various threads, and the second shows elementary application domain unloading. 示例 1Example 1 下面的代码示例定义`TestClass`类可以跨应用程序域边界进行封送处理和`Example`类包含`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)`ThreadProc`方法。The following code example defines a `TestClass` class that can be marshaled across application domain boundaries and an `Example` class containing a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) `ThreadProc` method. `ThreadProc`方法创建一个应用程序域中，创建`TestClass`对象在域中，调用的方法和`TestClass`卸载正在执行的域，导致。The `ThreadProc` method creates an application domain, creates a `TestClass` object in the domain, and calls a method of `TestClass` that unloads the executing domain, causing an . `TestClass`方法执行没有异常处理从线程和从普通的线程，演示未经处理的异常终止该任务或线程，但不是应用程序。The `TestClass` method is executed without exception handling from a thread and from an ordinary thread, demonstrating that the unhandled exception terminates the task or thread but not the application. 然后执行显式超时和没有处理从主应用程序线程，演示它终止应用程序时，如果未处理的异常。It is then executed with and without exception handling from the main application thread, demonstrating that it terminates the application if not handled. [!code-csharp[AppDomainUnloadedException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainUnloadedException/cs/Sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomainUnloadedException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainUnloadedException/vb/Sample.vb#1)] 示例 2Example 2 下面的代码示例创建和卸载应用程序域中，并演示会在后续尝试访问已卸载的域上引发。The following code example creates and unloads an application domain, and demonstrates that an is thrown on a subsequent attempt to access the unloaded domain. [!code-cpp[ADUnload#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADUnload/CPP/adunload.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADUnload#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADUnload/CS/adunload.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADUnload#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADUnload/VB/adunload.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化为系统提供的消息的描述错误，如"目标应用程序域已被卸载。"的新实例的属性This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "The target application domain has been unloaded." 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

span.span: The message that describes the error.

summary.span: 用指定的错误消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|

Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data.

param.name: context

span.span: The contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 用序列化数据初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

span.span: The message that describes the error.

param.name: innerException

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 参数不为空引用，则在处理内部异常的 块中引发当前异常。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not a null reference, the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回的相同值，如果传递到构造函数中，则为空引用属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|
